hint: add a boolean and turn it on when you drink an overload, turn it off when it’s effects are over. Then if you die while overload is on it just kills you without adding pk points.

item.title: Need to fix this fast
item.dc:creator: @ta1nt3d ta1nt3d
item.description:
@ta1nt3d wrote:

hello i recently added overload potions to my server and if you drink one to many times you die and get pk points

however if you die during combat you do not get them including npc deaths

i have no clue how to fix this can someone please help me i really need to get this fixed

here is my pk points :

[code=java]public void applyDead() {
c.respawnTimer = 15;
c.isDead = false;

if(c.duelStatus != 6) {
//c.killerId = c.getCombat().getKillerId(c.playerId);
c.killerId = findKiller();
Client o = (Client) Server.playerHandler.players[c.killerId];
if(o != null) {
if(!(c.npcIndex > 0) && c.inPits == false){
}
if (c.killerId != c.playerId)
o.sendMessage(“You have defeated “+Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName)+”!”);
c.playerKilled = c.playerId;
if(!PlayerKilling.hostOnList(o, c.connectedFrom)) {
PlayerKilling.addHostToList(o, c.connectedFrom);
o.pkPoints += 10;
o.sendMessage(“You have received 10 PK points, you now have “+o.pkPoints+” pk points.”);
} else {
o.sendMessage(“You have recently defeated “+c.playerName+”, you don’t receive any pk points.”);
}
if(o.duelStatus == 5) {
o.duelStatus++;
}
}
}[/code]

would rep if i could need this ASAP

Read full topic
